Isabella Rodriguez.description: conversing about Maria and Isabella are discussing supplies needed for a cozy rustic themed night out, including blankets, string lights, and coffee cups, with Isabella offering to help by providing these items from the café. @ <persona> Maria Lopez
chat: Isabella Rodriguez
Hey Maria, I noticed you're busy ordering supplies for our friends' night out. Is there anything specific you need help with?
Maria Lopez
Hey Isabella, actually, I was just about to ask if you have any spare cozy blankets from the café that we could use for the night out.
Isabella Rodriguez
Oh, of course Maria! We have a few cozy blankets stored in the back that we can definitely use. Let me grab them for you.
Maria Lopez
Thank you so much, Isabella! That would be a huge help for our cozy rustic theme. I really appreciate it.
Isabella Rodriguez
No problem at all, Maria. I'll bring them over to you as soon as we close up here. Anything else you need for the night out?
Maria Lopez
Thank you, Isabella. If you could also check if there are any spare string lights available, that would be perfect.
Isabella Rodriguez
Sure, I'll check for spare string lights as well. I'll bring them over with the blankets. Anything else you need before we close up?
Maria Lopez
Actually, Isabella, could you also check if there are any extra coffee cups available? We might need them for the night out.
Isabella Rodriguez
Sure, Maria. I'll check for the extra coffee cups as well and bring them over with the blankets and string lights. Anything else you need before we close up?
Maria Lopez
Thank you, Isabella. That should cover everything we need for the night out. I really appreciate your help.
